content.question: Which of the following best describes the part of the enslaved journey that Esi is experiencing in the passage?

choices.label: The initial capture and enslavement before being forced to march to the Atlantic coast
The wait on the Atlantic coast before being boarded onto a ship
The Middle Passage, in which enslaved Africans were transported across the Atlantic
The final part of the journey, including being resold and shipped to plantations or other places of servitude

content.answer: The wait on the Atlantic coast before being boarded onto a ship

topic.text: 2.3: Capture and the Impact of the Slave Trade on West African Societies

skill.text: 1.A: Identify and explain course concepts, developments, and processes.
